name: WORLD OF SOCCER 2021
description:
World of soccer is an upcoming arcade mini soccer game .

Coming soon in November 2- 2020

WOS 21 Will have friendly match , cup competition , league competition .

Friendly match : 

Play a normal match and choose the opponent and the weather game.

Cup competition :

 Play the 5 cup matches without being knocked out.

League competition : 

Play the 10 league matches and reach 20 PTS to win the league.

New modes or features coming in future updates and WOS future games.

WOS21.

RKGAMES953.
